game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the Lost Artifact from the Soulless Castle.
game.description: This quest requires the player to journey to the Soulless Castle, defeat the evil sorcerer, and retrieve the lost artifact. The artifact is crucial to the survival of our kingdom.

task.objective: Defeat the guards at the Soulless Castle entrance
task.description: You need to defeat the guards stationed at the entrance of the Soulless Castle to gain access.
Search the castle and locate the sorcerer's hideout.

task.objective: Defeat the sorcerer and retrieve the artifact
task.description: Finally, defeat the sorcerer in a battle and retrieve the lost artifact at his hidden chamber.
